name: Sweets Store Mania
description:
Welcome to your candy store!

How to play:

-Manage your shop. The calendar marks your progress. Pass to the next day by reaching the daily money goal!

-Make money satisfying your client's orders , touch in the candies or machines. Don't leave your clients angry!

-Keep passing days to unlock new types of candy and special machines to add to the store! Or you can buy them in our store just touch the shopping button in the game.

-Unlock a bunch of sweet candy like: yummy chocolate, cute gummy bears, fun bubble gum, amazing lollipops and candy cane! And special machines like: cupcake maker, popcorn machine, drink vending machine and more!


Enjoy this great saga! This game is totally free with cute candy! Have fun!

From the creators of A-List: Spa Beauty Salon and nail salon!
